verses.verse: But I <S%G2919>determined<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> with <S%G1683>myself,<s%> that I would not <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to you in <S%G3077>heaviness.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G3076>make<s%> you <S%G3076>sorry,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> is he <S%G2532>then<s%> that <S%G2165>makes<s%> me <S%G2165>glad,<s%> but the same which is <S%G3076>made<s%> <S%G3076>sorry<s%> by me?

And I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> to <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3363>lest,<s%> when I <S%G2064>came,<s%> I should <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> from them of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G5463>rejoice;<s%> having <S%G3982>confidence<s%> in you <S%G3956>all,<s%> that my <S%G5479>joy<s%> is the joy of you <S%G3956>all.<s%>

For out of <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%> and <S%G4928>anguish<s%> of <S%G2588>heart<s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to you with <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1144>tears;<s%> not that you should be <S%G3076>grieved,<s%> but that you might <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4056>more<s%> <S%G4056>abundantly<s%> to you.

But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3076>caused<s%> <S%G3076>grief,<s%> he has not <S%G3076>grieved<s%> me, but in <S%G3313>part:<s%> that I may not <S%G1912>overcharge<s%> you <S%G3956>all.<s%>
<S%G2425>Sufficient<s%> to <S%G5108>such<s%> a man is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2009>punishment,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was inflicted of <S%G4119>many.<s%>

<S%G5620>So<s%> that <S%G5121>contrariwise<s%> you ought <S%G3123>rather<s%> to <S%G5483>forgive<s%> him, and <S%G3870>comfort<s%> him, <S%G3381>lest<s%> <S%G3381>perhaps<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a one should be <S%G2666>swallowed<s%> up with <S%G4055>overmuch<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow.<s%>
<S%G1352>Why<s%> I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you that you would <S%G2964>confirm<s%> your <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> him.

For to <S%G5124>this<s%> end <S%G2532>also<s%> did I <S%G1125>write,<s%> that I might <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G1382>proof<s%> of you, <S%G1487>whether<s%> you be <S%G5255>obedient<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> things.

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G5483>forgive<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing, I <S%G5483>forgive<s%> <S%G2532>also:<s%> for <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G5483>forgave<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> thing, to <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G5483>forgave<s%> it, for <S%G5209>your<s%> sakes forgave I it in the <S%G4383>person<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>
<S%G2443>Lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> should <S%G4122>get<s%> an <S%G4122>advantage<s%> of us: for we are not <S%G50>ignorant<s%> of his <S%G3540>devices.<s%>

<S%G1161>Furthermore,<s%> when I <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G5174>Troas<s%> to preach <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> and a <S%G2374>door<s%> was <S%G455>opened<s%> to me of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>

I <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G425>rest<s%> in my <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> because I <S%G2147>found<s%> not <S%G5103>Titus<s%> my <S%G80>brother:<s%> but taking my <S%G657>leave<s%> of them, I <S%G1831>went<s%> from there <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5485>thanks<s%> be to <S%G2316>God,<s%> which <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2358>causes<s%> us to <S%G2358>triumph<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G5319>makes<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> the <S%G3744>aroma<s%> of his <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> by us in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place.<s%>
For we are to <S%G2316>God<s%> a <S%G2175>sweet<s%> <S%G2175>smell<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> in them that are <S%G4982>saved,<s%> and in them that <S%G622>perish:<s%>

To the <S%G3303>one<s%> we are the <S%G3744>smell<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> to <S%G2288>death;<s%> and to the <S%G3739>other<s%> the <S%G3744>smell<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> to <S%G2222>life.<s%> And <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G2425>sufficient<s%> for <S%G5023>these<s%> things?

For we are not as <S%G4183>many,<s%> which <S%G2585>corrupt<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> but as of <S%G1505>sincerity,<s%> but as of <S%G2316>God,<s%> in the <S%G2714>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> we in <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
